items.title: Sweden plans to remove citizenship from people seen as threat to state
items.description: But it stops short of calls by the minority government for gangsters to have their citizenship revoked.

items.title: Germany to shoot down drones near military sites
items.description: The number of sightings has increased since Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine, officials say.

items.title: Kenyan minister alleges intelligence agency behind his son's abduction
items.description: Justin Muturi says his son was freed following President William Ruto's intervention.
